Text.Name: Story_DragonBlood
Text.Desc: Dragon's Bloodline Awakening: Constitution increased by 20%; Perception increased by 20%; Fundamentally increases ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด by 25%.

Text.Name: Modifier_GreenBrothel
Text.Desc: Having had fun at the Green Manor, the good mood will continue for 5 days.
